SEARCH
Package Abstract

Class Repository<T extends IEntity>

java.lang.Object
Abstract.Repository<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of entity managed by this repository, must implement IEntity
Direct Known Subclasses:
ApplicantRepository, EnquiryRepository, ManagerRepository, OfficerRepository, ProjectApplicationRepository, ProjectRegistrationRepository, ProjectRepository, ReplyRepository, UsersRepository
public abstract class Repository<T extends IEntity> extends Object
Generic abstract repository class to manage storage, retrieval, and persistence of entities that implement the IEntity interface. This class supports operations such as loading from CSV, saving to CSV, filtering, and ID-based access.

    • fromCSVRow

      public abstract T fromCSVRow(String row)
      Converts a CSV row string into an entity instance. Must be implemented by subclasses.
      Parameters:
      row - the CSV-formatted row
      Returns:
      the parsed entity instance

      public boolean store()

      Returns:

      Creates a new entity in the repository. Fails if the entity is null or already exists.
      Parameters:

      public List<T> getByFilter(Predicate<T> predicate)

    • getLastId

      protected String getLastId()
      Example gets list of enquiries with enquiry.applicantID == applicant object id public static List getEnquires(Applicant applicant){ EnquiryRepository repo = getEnquiryRepository(); return repo.getByFilter((Enquiry enquiry) -> record.getApplicantID().equals(applicant.getID())); }

    • generateId

      public String generateId(String defaultprefix)
      Generates a new ID based on the most recent one and the specified prefix.
      Parameters:
      defaultprefix - the prefix for the ID (e.g., "EN" for Enquiry)
      Returns:
      the newly generated ID
